channel.title: Osu! The game that requires SERIOUS REFLEXES
channel.description: A fun, yet challenging for some, game that requires reflex time and accuracy. One of my favorite games at the moment. You can download songs that others made and play to their user-created levels. You click on circles called "Bitmaps" that normally go along with the beat of the song you are playing. You can play on osu! verified levels or go in to the non-verified section, brace yourself because those might not go along with the music. It's based on anime for most of the songs for all you anime lovers, I know I am one. Most of the time, all of the songs have an "Easy" "Normal" "Hard" and "Insane" mode, I normally play Normal to Hard myself. Here's a video of what it is so you can get a general gist of what the game is all about, the song is on the "Normal" difficulty. This is currently my absolute most favorite songs to play at the moment. I am the one playing in this video. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dh9SaQMPBvY The link to the game is [url=https://osu.ppy.sh/]https://osu.ppy.sh/[/url], I hope to see you on, and pls add me i haf no frends

item.title: Osu! The game that requires SERIOUS REFLEXES
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I suggest tweaking a bit of your settings to make your play experience more pleasant. Disable Background Video, Storyboards, Combo Bursts, Snaking Sliders. Also, I suggest looking for a nice skin that isn’t too distracting from play. Try doomsday’s skin or one of niko’s skins (my favourite is niko v5). You should also disable mouse acceleration because it makes your mouse movements inconsistent. I personally enabled the ‘raw input’ option in osu but you can test it and see what you prefer. I find the HUD very distracting when I’m playing so I disable it using shift+tab. Finally, I didn’t know this when I first started but you can click using your keyboard (z/x by default). It’s a lot better than using the mouse buttons.

Read full topic
item.source: Osu! The game that requires SERIOUS REFLEXES

item.title: Osu! The game that requires SERIOUS REFLEXES
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

reyx7:

what sort of anime madness is this

I only know of it because it’s used a lot for reaction training in up-coming CS:GO players, mid pack players around MG-MGE and usually aspiring AWPers. It helps them with holding close angles etc.

I’d imagine it’ll be used in other reaction intensive games too.

Read full topic
